name: Hell Inc. (Working Title)
description:
Hell .

Known to mortals as a place of torment and suffering.
Although tormenting sinners is still the norm, the focus shifted from simple torture to the maximization of human suffering.
 To achive such a high state of effiency, Hell turned into the worst kind of administration system:

Bureaucracy.

Most Demons were more than happy to increase the suffering to humans. But there are always exceptions...

Since Hell's experiences a strange spike in sinning humans, it sends out their best I.D.I.O.T. to investigate and resolve the issue: Damien, a lazy and sassy Demon who has to travel to the Human world to capture the rampant personifications of the 7 deadly sins.

Features:

  • Play as a  lazy Demon with a refreshing perspective on our human world
  • Explore a hand-drawn 2D world and interact with the environment and NPC's
  • Investigate and learn more about the modern interpretations of the 7 Deadly sins and their handiwork on the wrong realm. What is their goal? How can you stop them?
  • Befriend Humans with their unique personalities and learn more about humans and their weird culture and habits- Maybe they are not so bad and annoying after all?
